### 3. (2 pts) What happens when you mix types inside a vector?
##### So what R does in this case is it tries to make all elements of the same type, after looking it up I found that this process is called coercion.
```{r}
x1 <- c(1.7, "a", FALSE)
x2 <- c(TRUE, 2)
class(x1)
class(x2)

```
